Navigational tools used in this course.

REF = Reference.   This will bring up a list of key references and links that have been used within the content

These are the main navigational tools.   Rewind (return to beginning),
Page advance, Page Back, and Close (X). If the button is grey, it will not be active as a navigational tool.

Key Navigational area

The "X" button will close this window

TOC = Table of Contents.   This will bring up a list of the contents for you to navigate to a specific page.

link = website linkage.   This will bring up a new browser window, and directly load the required link into the browser.   Ensure you allow for the "pop-up" to occur

info = further info to read.   This will bring up a new window with information for your to read.

This animated green arrow is directly "clickable" and will engage another action, such as a page flip or a return to another page.

This set of "clickable" items will either take you forward or backward through several pages, and will engage another action, such as a page flip or a return to another page.
